clauses.title: 1. Services
items: E-Samn Labs provides website development, e-commerce solutions, custom software, and related consulting services.
Pricing, timelines, and deliverables will be agreed separately in a written proposal or quotation.

clauses.title: 2. Payment Terms
items: Clients must pay 25% of the total project cost upfront before work begins and 25% upon design approval.
The balance is payable upon completion and delivery of the project.
The 25% deposit is non-refundable once work has commenced.

clauses.title: 3. Domain & Hosting
items: Clients are responsible for purchasing and maintaining their own domain names and hosting plans.
E-Samn Labs does not include domain or hosting costs in its charges.
We may recommend third-party providers but are not responsible for their performance.

clauses.title: 4. Client Responsibilities
items: Provide timely content, images, and other required materials.
Ensure all provided materials are legally owned or licensed.
Provide prompt feedback and approvals to avoid project delays.

clauses.title: 5. Intellectual Property
items: Final deliverables (design, code, etc.) become the Client’s property only after full payment.
Pre-existing code, tools, or frameworks used remain the property of E-Samn Labs.

clauses.title: 6. Revisions & Changes
items: The project includes a limited number of revisions as specified in the agreement.
Any changes outside the agreed scope will require a change request and additional fees.

clauses.title: 7. Project Delays
items: We provide services with reasonable skill and care.
Delays due to client feedback, content delays, or third-party issues (e.g., hosting providers, APIs) are not our responsibility.

clauses.title: 8. Limitation of Liability
items: E-Samn Labs’ liability is limited to the amount paid by the Client for the project.
We are not liable for indirect or consequential losses, including lost revenue, data, or termination.

clauses.title: 9. Termination
items: Either party may terminate the agreement with written notice.
The Client will be invoiced for work completed up to the termination date.
Deposits are non-refundable once work has started.

clauses.title: 10. Confidentiality
items: Both parties agree to keep confidential information private unless authorized in writing.

clauses.title: 11. Governing Law
items: These Terms are governed by the laws of Kenya.
Disputes will be resolved in Kenyan courts.

clauses.title: 12. Updates
items: E-Samn Labs may update these Terms at any time. The latest version will always be available on e-samnlab.me/terms.
